meanings.definition: A small marine fish, also known as a tomcod.
meanings.sent1: I saw a school of tommycods swimming near the coral reef.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen caught many tommycods during their fishing trip.
meanings.sent3: The tommycods were having a party in the underwater cave.
meanings.sent4: The tommycods danced gracefully in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the tommycods sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The fishermen displayed buckets full of tommycods at the market.
meanings.sent2: Tommycods are small fish that are commonly found in cold waters.
meanings.sent3: The tommycods gathered to discuss their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The tommycods swam together in a synchronized pattern.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of grilled tommycods filled the seaside village.
